detail_application.Name: Live Cricket Matches
detail_application.descriptions:
★★★★★ World best application for Live Cricket Matches
★★★★★ Multiple streams from low, medium and high quality
★★★★★ Watch Match Highlights
★★★★★ Cricket news from expert resources with details
★★★★★ Live scores for each International cricket matches
★★★★★ High speed streaming servers to accept the high volume of users, so no down time like other apps.
★★★★★ Covering all the World cup cricket matches.
Install this app and don't miss any T-20, T-10, ODI, PSL and test match
Premier Cricket App with Millions of fans world wide.
Covers Live international T-20, T-10, ODI Test cricket matches of international teams including following
Afghanistan
Australia
England
India
New Zealand
Pakistan
South Africa
Sri Lanka
West Indies
Bangladesh
Zimbabwe
United Arab Emirates
Ireland
Scotland
Hong Kong
Namibia
Netherlands
Watch Cricket highlights of matches with in few hours of live cricket match
Get live score updates any time for all current live matches
Watch hot cricket news updated hourly.
